subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox’ pursuit of a late-inning reliever, identified by General Manager Ben Cherington as an area of need, began and ended with one name: Edward Mujica.
snippet: The Boston Red Sox’ pursuit of a late-inning reliever, identified by General Manager Ben Cherington as an area of need, began and ended with one name: Edward Mujica.
